name: Clipper2 32bit & 64bit DLLs (v 1.5.3)
body:
These DLLs provide access to almost all of Clipper2's features via the functions exported in [clipper.export.h](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/blob/main/CPP/Clipper2Lib/include/clipper2/clipper.export.h). This file also documents the simple (language agnostic) data structures required by these functions.

The repository's [DLL folder](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/tree/main/DLL) contains not only the Visual Studio project files used to compile these DLLs, but also source code for a Delphi utility which demonstrates using these DLLs.

name: Clipper2 ver. 1.5.3
body:
Changes since Ver 1.5.2:
Numerous bugfixes (See GitHub issues 734 - 974)

name: Clipper2 ver. 1.5.2
body:
Changes (since Ver 1.5.0)
  CPP: tidied file header includes (#940)
  CPP: emplace_back() replaces many push_back() (#939)
  Fixed typos and broken links (#936)

name: Clipper2 ver. 1.5.0
body: This release contains multiple minor bug fixes (see revisions https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/issues/870 - https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/issues/934).

name: Clipper2 ver. 1.4.0
body: This release contains multiple minor bug fixes (see revisions #733 - #867).

name: Clipper2 ver. 1.3.0
body:
**Version 1.3.0 (28 Nov. 2023)**
  1. Fixed a significant offsetting bug introduced in previous update (#733)
  2. Fixed a C++ compile error when 32bit compiling (#727)
  3. Minor tweak to CMakeLists.txt (C++) (#728)
  4. Will now offset 'flat' polygons (Disc.#725)
  5. Reminder: recent change in open path offsetting behaviour (#707)
  6. Reminder: recent changes to clipper.export.h data structures.

name: Clipper2 32bit & 64bit DLLs (v 1.2.4)
body:
These DLLs provide access to almost all of Clipper2's features via the functions exported in [clipper.export.h](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/blob/main/CPP/Clipper2Lib/include/clipper2/clipper.export.h). This file also documents the simple (language agnostic) data structures required by these functions.

The repository's [DLL folder](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/tree/main/DLL) contains not only the Visual Studio project files used to compile these DLLs, but also source code for a Delphi utility which demonstrates using these DLLs.

name: Clipper2 ver 1.2.4
body:
Changes since ver 1.2.3:
  1. Important: Offsetting open path behaviour has changed. 
     The delta now behaves as it did in Clipper1 (See Issue #707)
  2. Important: Data structures of exported values in clipper.export.h have changed.
  3. Minor bugfixes to PolyTree nesting (#679, #687)
  4. Numerous minor bugfixes to polygon offsetting (#703, #715, #724)
  5. Fixed an obscure bug in polygon clipping caused by horizontal spikes (#720)
  6. Significantly improved documentation.

name: Clipper2 ver 1.2.2
body:
This is a minor bugfix release. 
(Bugfixes between #422 and #465)
[Clipper2_1.2.2.zip](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/files/11071418/Clipper2_1.2.2.zip)

name: Clipper2 32bit & 64bit DLLs (ver 1.2.0)
body:
These DLLs provide access to almost all of **Clipper2**'s features via the functions exported in [clipper.export.h](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/blob/main/CPP/Clipper2Lib/include/clipper2/clipper.export.h). This file also documents the simple (language agnostic) data structures required by these functions.

The repository's [DLL folder ](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/tree/main/DLL) contains not only the Visual Studio project files used to compile these DLLs, but also source code for a Delphi utility which demonstrates using these DLLs.

name: Clipper2 ver 1.1.1
body:
This is a minor update since ver Clipper2 1.1.0

Fixes a clipping bug introduced in the previous release (Issue #381).
[Clipper2_1.1.1.zip](https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Clipper2/files/10515938/Clipper2_1.1.1.zip)

name: Clipper2 ver 1.1
body:
This is the latest release of Clipper 2.

The major changes since version 1.0 include:
- much improved merging of 'touching' polygons in clipping solutions
- addition of RectClip function that performs *much* faster intersect clipping when the clipping region is rectangular
- numerous minor bug fixes

name: Clipper2_1.0.6
body:
**Version 1.0.6 - 28 October 2022**
-   Added RectClip and RectClipLines functions for FAST rectangular clipping
-   Added clipper.export.h C++ file (for DLL/so creation)
-   Added DLL project files and Delphi test app.
-   Numerous minor bug fixes.

name: Clipper2 ver 1.0.5
body:
Version 1.0.5 - 2 October 2022
-   Numerous improvements to C++ makefile and revised C++ folder structure (#243, #247)
-   Fixed bug in C++ Point<T> constructor when USINGZ defined (#246)
-   Improved performance by removing time costly round() function calls (#236)
-   Changed Library's C# target framework back to netstandard2.0 (#225)
-   Updated several sample apps.

name: Clipper2 ver 1.0.4
body: This is the initial release of Clipper2
